content: these are very simple-to-make but versatile legwarmers they slouch a bit at the ankle but keep your calves warm the legwarmers pictured is made with one skein willow yarns wash measures 11 high with a circumference that goes from 8 relaxed to 18 extended to make these you just need to be able to cast on knit and purl work in the round on a circular needle or on double pointed needles and bind off yay warm legs skirts in winter
